about_the_game:
SUCCUBUS ROULETTE is a tabletop Nsfw game that attempts to re-design the infamous game of Buckshot roulette replacing the traditional pump-action shotgun with a magic deck of cards. This extra something :v, and more importantly the different mechanics in dealing the cards compared to a shotgun offers a fresh take on the classic and deadly game of chance.

The game takes place after the events of Doki Doki Tri-Line Quest, where the protagonist is summoned to a place that exists between everything and nothing to participate in a sacred game among succubi. An ancient god awaits—will you meet with them?

FEATURES:

- 15 to 20 minute playthrough.

 - Is not that Immersive or grounded as buckshot roulette but is honest work :0. 

 - Unscripted rounds that offer unpredictable yet controllable outcomes, with a fair amount of replay value. 

 - A ruthless yet fair AI, that makes decisions based on what's on the table, rather than under it.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has different representations of sexual acts such as bdsm, sex toys, shibary,edging, hard anal and vaginal sex . The content will be shown during the gameplay where the protagonist plays an old sacred game between succubus where both parties accept the game and its consequences.

name: Succubus Roulette

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 880M, AMD Radeon R9 Series, or similar
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play Succubus Roulette with a deck of 8 cards. Two enter. One comes out. Bet your ass to roll the dice. Good luck.
